system.crew:
2 Hardpoints for Weapons and/or Support Systems
Recommended Loadout: Burst Cannon/Fusion Blaster, Target Lock
system.passengers:
Battle Suit Strength: 45
Primary Systems: Blacksun Filter, Enhanced Motive Systems, Environmental Seal, Jet Pack, Multi-Tracker
Special: Equipped with Integral Stealth Field Generator, Suffers no Penalty for Concealment Tests due to Size, scores two additional Degrees of Success on successful Concealment, Dodge, Shadowing, or Stealth Tests.
